response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. Our aim is to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction that not only maximizes your investment but also ensures long-term success for both parties involved.

I understand that this product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and we are confident that by accepting this offer, you will secure significant savings while still acquiring a valuable asset. We are committed to providing exceptional customer service and support throughout the entire process, ensuring a seamless transition and maximizing the benefits of this acquisition for you.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details of this offer, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I am more than happy to provide additional insights or address any concerns you might have.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
